title: Roasted Butternut Squash and Fennel Soup with Citrus

Ingredients.1: 1 (3 pound) butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch cubes

Ingredients.2: 1 bulb fresh fennel, white part only, cut into 1/2-inch slices

Ingredients.8: 0.25 cup all-natural marmalade (such as Smuckers® Natural)

Ingredients.11: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Combine butternut squash, fennel, onion, and garlic on the baking sheet. Drizzle with oil and salt and toss until well combined.

Directions.3: Roast vegetables in the preheated oven until soft and lightly browned, 35 to 40 minutes.

Directions.4: Puree 1/2 of the vegetable mixture in a blender with 1/2 of the broth until smooth. Pour mixture into a large saucepan set over low heat. Puree the rest of the vegetables and broth; add to the saucepan.

Directions.5: Stir in marmalade and pumpkin and heat through over low heat. Stir in cream before serving. Season with salt and pepper.
